mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SYS_USER( N_XH, C_ZDYMC, N_CDXH, USER_ID, N_XSXH, C_YXX )VALUES( SEQ_WDZM.NEXTVAL,
#{cZdymc}, #{nCdxh}, #{userId}, #{nXsxh}, #{cYxx} )
SELECT SEQ_WDZM.CURRVAL AS ID FROM dual
mapper.update: update B_WDZM set N_XH = #{nXh}, C_ZDYMC = #{cZdymc}, N_CDXH = #{nCdxh}, USER_ID = #{userId}, N_XSXH = #{nXsxh}, C_YXX = #{cYxx} WHERE N_XH = #{nXh}
